title: Simple Solitaire header rename and centered board layout

requirements.summary: Rename the Solitaire page header title text to exactly "Simple Solitaire" without changing any other user-facing copy.
acceptanceCriteria: On the main Solitaire page header, the large centered title text displays "Simple Solitaire".
No other user-facing text strings are changed (e.g., footer text, empty pile placeholders, button labels, dialogs).

file_operations.description: Update the header <h1> text content from the current string to exactly "Simple Solitaire" while leaving all other strings and UI content unchanged.

requirements.summary: Center the top-row piles and tableau piles horizontally across breakpoints while preserving responsive wrapping and drag-and-drop behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: On desktop and mobile widths, the top row of piles and the tableau piles are visually centered within the main content area (not left-aligned on larger screens).
Drag-and-drop still functions correctly for tableau and foundation drop targets after the layout change.
The layout remains responsive: piles can wrap to new lines as needed and no new persistent horizontal scrollbar is introduced on common screen sizes.

file_operations.description: Adjust the Tailwind layout classes for the top-row and tableau flex containers to be centered at all responsive breakpoints (remove the larger-screen left alignment), while keeping flex-wrap enabled to prevent horizontal overflow and ensuring existing drag-and-drop handlers continue to receive events.
